title: Podcast & Brand Audio | Daniel Tureck - Mix Engineer, Editor, Sound Designer
description: Daniel Tureck is a podcast mix engineer, editor and sound designer based in Long Beach, CA. Clients include Audible, Disney, Hulu, Vox Media, MSNBC, iHeart Media, Spotify and more.
intro: Daniel has spent years working across podcast production, commercial audio and branded content - editing, mixing, mastering and sound designing projects for some of the biggest names in the space.

services.name: Podcast Mixing
services.description: Full mix of dialogue, music and sound effects for a polished, broadcast-ready episode.

services.name: Podcast Editing
services.description: Dialogue editing, timing, pacing and cleanup to keep the conversation tight and natural.

services.name: Sound Design
services.description: Custom sound design, transitions and sonic branding that give a show its own identity.

services.name: Mastering
services.description: Final loudness, EQ and format delivery optimized for every streaming platform.

services.name: Scoring
services.description: Original music and underscore composed to fit the tone and arc of your show.

services.name: Commercial Audio
services.description: Audio production for TV spots, branded content and media campaigns.
